elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Now answer the following questions using the table structure of partial results:

elements.name: question1
elements.title: a) What was the turnover of the Basel branch?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: b) What was the lowest total turnover in Zurich?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: c) How many total sales were higher than 80,000?

elements.name: question6
elements.title: d) What was the average turnover in Lucerne in the quarter?

elements.name: question7
elements.title: e) How many average sales were less than CHF 20,000?
